title: Holiday Inn Express & Suites Newberry SC Offers Affordable Lodging for Newberry College Football Game
text: Email This Story Printer Friendly PDF Version RSS Feed Holiday Inn Express & Suites Newberry SC Offers Affordable Lodging for Newberry College Football Game Holiday Inn Express & Suites Newberry, SC offers affordable lodging for fans attending the Newberry College football game on September 12, 2015. We offer outstanding accommodations just minutes from campus. NEWBERRY, SC, September 02,   Fans attending the first Newberry College home football game on September 12 will find affordable lodging at the Holiday Inn Express & Suites Newberry, SC. The Newberry Saints will host Jacksonville University in a non-conference game. Kickoff time will be at 1pm on Setzler Field. Ticket prices start at $10. "Our hotel near downtown Newberry is the perfect place for Newberry football fans to stay," comments Ambria Lanteigne, General Manager of the Holiday Inn Express & Suites. "We offer outstanding accommodations just minutes from campus," continues Ms. Lanteigne. This award winning Newberry South Carolina hotel features non-smoking guest rooms with a microwave, mini refrigerator, and free high speed Internet. Some rooms have jetted tubs. Guests will sleep in comfort on Simply Smart beds. The complimentary Express Start Breakfast Bar, with signature cinnamon rolls, is the perfect way to start the day. Property amenities include a 24-hour business center, meeting rooms, and a fitness center. A variety of snacks and convenience items may be purchased at the sundry shop in the lobby. The Holiday Inn Express & Suites Newberry received a 2015 TripAdvisor Certificate of Excellence Award. The hotel is located off I-26 at Exit 76. Nearby points of interest include the Newberry Opera House, Carter & Holmes Orchids, and Sumter National Forest. Lodging specials include the Romantic Escape Package and the In-Room Pizza Package. AAA, military, and senior discounts are available. IHG Rewards Club members will earn points for their stay at this property. For the 2015 Newberry College football schedule, visit www.newberrywolves.com . To book your stay at the Holiday Inn Express & Suites Newberry SC hotel , call 803-321-3955 or visit www.NEWBERRYSOUTHCAROLINAHOTEL.com .About Holiday Inn Express & Suites Hotel Newberry The Holiday Inn Express & Suites Hotel in Newberry is the premier choice among Newberry South Carolina hotels. They are conveniently located at exit 76 off of I-26, about 30 minutes north of Columbia and less than an hour south of Greenville, SC. This Newberry SC hotel has outstanding amenities, including an indoor pool, whirlpool and Fitness Center. Guest should be sure to stop by their complimentary Express Start Breakfast Bar each morning for delights like their signature cinnamon rolls and Smart Roast coffee. Few other Newberry South Carolina hotels can provide travelers with these perks backed by the reputable name they trust. "Stay Smart" at the Holiday Inn Express & Suites Hotel. For more information visit: http://www.NewberrySouthCarolinaHotel.com Allison Reinert
